author: terencechain
content: Do we want to support syncing to the head of the chain for first iteration of multi client intertop? I realized the eip7732 p2p spec is under spec'd it's missing RPC protocol to support syncing execution payload by range

author: terencechain
content: And we also haven't implemented it for Prysm. Anything concerning syncing payloads

author: potuz
content: Oh let's add this to the agenda next time.
